Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its immense value to you, I am confident it will be a game-changer. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at an exceptional price of $10000. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best value while maximizing your investment. Please let me know if you wish to proceed with this opportunity. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
